name: Bean-Sabre
description:
Defeat all Enemies in the level to unlock the trap door. Find the trapdoor to progress into the labyrinth. How long can you survive?

Made for the ECGameJam #3

Controls:
w,a,s,d to move around
mouse to look around
hold left moue button to wind up attack, release to execute attack

Music: 8-bit Resolve, by ImmortalPigeon (https://soundcloud.com/user-958324595)
